Invest in a bed frame with adjustable height to accommodate different heights and preferences.
Add a cooling mattress cover to the bed to help regulate body temperature during sleep.
Install a bed rail on one or both sides of the bed to provide an extra level of safety and security for those who have difficulty getting in and out of bed.
Use a white noise machine or earplugs to block out any disruptive sounds that may interfere with sleep.
Consider using a weighted blanket to provide additional warmth and pressure point relief during sleep.
